I thought my Fresh Vine Ripe Tomatoes wo: as you can see from the graphic ,
I received five whole tomatoes and one
that had already been cut in half .
The half-tomato in my package had dripped on the other ones
In fact , the resulting tomato juice ate a hole through the box
making a puddle on the floor
He fell and fractured his spine ,
His wife and nine children are destitute , all thanks to these vine-ripened tomatoes .
this packaging is just a bad idea
